website_summaries.verdict: This unicorn and her pals take things to the next level with an array of magical scents.
pros: Cute and cuddly, this unicorn smells exactly the way it looks
Cotton candy scent adds another layer to the sensory experience these plush pillows already provide
Available in a variety of adorable designs exuding favorite childhood aromas, including cookies and gummy bears
cons: The scent may fade over time

customer_reviews.title: Super cute doggy for all ages? Maybe, pillow company plz read
customer_reviews.text: Super cute idea but would be much better (I think) if the whole body of it smelled like chocolate chip cookies and not just one little patch that smells. Hint, hint pillow company lol! Size wise, its great for a child and I know the company didn't market it for us adults, that being said...maybe some adults would enjoy these too so the company should consider making some sized pillows for the adults that are young at heart!
customer_reviews.author: ThePinkPanda

customer_reviews.title: They definitely smell strong!!
customer_reviews.text: The 5 & 6 year olds I purchased these for saw the commercial on TV and Amazon had the for the same price so we ordered them for XMas present gifts. They definitely smell strong! Their hair smells like the pillow for a couple hours after they wake up. It's been a month and the pillow(s) still smell strong. The other scent he ordered was Popsicle
customer_reviews.author: T. LaForest

customer_reviews.title: It smells like real cookies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for as a gift for one of my classmates's babyshower and she fell in love with it. It was a very decent size pillow for a new born, and it's cookie Cologne made the baby even happier.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Adon

customer_reviews.title: It is super cute. I didn't realize the pillow part would ...
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute. I didn't realize the pillow part would be smaller than a regular pillow pet. I am a bit disappointed by that, but I otherwise really like it. You have to directly smell the cookie decal to get the scent, but I like that it isn't overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: momof3aml

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: It is adorable, but real not much of a scent. My daughter loves it and we bought several to carry around and for bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, soft but it does not really smell like anything and for sure not watermelon, maybe a very light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this pillow for kids ages 4-10 years old. Unicorn pillow pet is soft, trendy, and comes with a cool scratch and sniff feature. It can be folded and velcroed to play with or unfolded into a pillow. The scent is very sweet but enjoyable. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn E.

customer_reviews.title: UNICORN LOVERS
customer_reviews.text: ADORABLE, SUPER WONDERFUL LITTLE CHILDS' GIFT FROM A COMPANY WITH A HEART CALLED "PILLOW PETS" IN CARLSBAD, CA. ANYONE ON YOUR LIST WHO LOVES UNICORNS AND IS YOUNG AT HEART WILL LOVE IT AND ALL THE OTHER TREASURES YOU WILL FINDTHERE!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I foresee my daughter loving this, it is going to be a christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Amber J Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt get again due to smell
customer_reviews.text: There was no scent besides a factory/basement type smell. Besides that its cute but definitely needed to be washed first, which is sad considering it was supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shyanne P.

customer_reviews.title: It is good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller the the normal pet pillow. It is good for traveling. You get a lot of attension in the airplane.

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I ever got for my niece

customer_reviews.title: Cute But No Scent
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and is perfect size for my toddler. I would have given 5 stars, but my pillow doesn't smell like a watermelon at all. I don't know if there is just something wrong with this particular one, but mine doesn't have a scent at all.

customer_reviews.title: She really loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my youngest because I had bought pillow pets years ago for my other two older children, but then couldn't find them at the stores for her. I love this and she has had it since December and it is now July and it still smells great. Hasn't come apart at all, granted I haven't washed it but be sure to follow wash directions and it should be fine. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but scent not super great
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cuddly. I bought this for a blind child and unfortunately the scent only is located in a few "spots" on dog- not all over like some of the scented toys. I worry the scent will not last long. But on the plus side, it's not overpowering either!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Cute scented unicorn!
customer_reviews.text: The unicorn is really cute. And it indeed smells like cotton candy! I love this product!

customer_reviews.title: So cute had to get a 2nd!

customer_reviews.title: Only the patch on the pillow smells like the scent
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as I thought it would be. Only the patch on the pillow smells like the scent. Have purchased other pillow pets in the past and prefer the original non-scented version.

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow for my younger cousin and it was love at first sight. If I could I'd give this awesome scented pillow 10 stars. It smelled awesome, was in great shape, and was very soft. If your debating the decision of buying this pillow, I'd ignore all the bad feedback and but this fantastic pillow.

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Cookie Pup!!! =)
customer_reviews.text: Silky soft, adorably cute, and smells like a chocolate chip cookie!! Such a darling addition to any child's (or child-at-heart's) Pillow Pet collection! =) This puppy is delightfully gender-neutral with its brown and black chocolate chip colors-- perfect for both boys and girls! Cookie Pup has an absolutely darling face and soft, floppy ears. =) I love dogs; I love chocolate; and I love Pillow Pets! =) Cookie Pup is definitely one of my favorite Pillow Pets yet!!! =) Five snuggly, sweet-scented stars for Cookie Pup!!!! ^..^ *****
customer_reviews.author: ThelmaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Pillow Pets Sweet Scented Pets, Cotton Candy Unicorn, 16" Cotton Candy Scented Stuffed Animal Plush Toy
product_meta.description: Color:White/PinkThe Pillow Pets Sweet Scented Pets – Cotton Candy Unicorn delivers the smell of freshly made cotton candy ready to indulge in all its fully sweetness. A yummy cone of cotton candy sits on the front leg of this adorable white and pink unicorn making this a definite must-have for cotton candy fans everywhere. The Sweet Scented Pillow Pets deliver the smell of yummy sweet treats in a plush you can hug. This adorably delicious folding plush will provide a touch of fun room décor along with the practicality of everyday use as both a toy for imaginative play and a pillow for television, bed, or travel time. The Sweet Scented Pets – Cotton Candy Unicorn is anything but just another toddler pillow. Starts out as your pal, then un-fasten its belly, and it magically becomes your pillow! A bedtime solution that will have your kids running to their room with their new pet for a good night’s rest on their new sweet-scented favorite pillow. The scents are created in the United States and are made from sustainably harvested trees or cotton. Each scent has certification from the International Fragrance Association and complies with USA & EU Toy regulations including stuffed animals. Made of high-quality washable chenille. BPA free and phthalates free. Opens to a 16-inch pillow. As with all decorative pillows, not recommended for children under the age of 3.
feature_bullets: ADORABLY DELICIOUS: The Pillow Pets Sweet Scented Pets – Cotton Candy Unicorn delivers the smell of freshly made cotton candy ready to indulge in all its dreamy sweetness.
DELIGHTFUL CUDDLES FOR EVERYONE: A yummy cone of cotton candy sits on the front leg of this adorable white and pink unicorn making this a definite must-have for cotton candy fans everywhere.
SWEET DREAMS ANYTIME! Ideal for rest time and fun time. Starts out as a plush toy, then un-fasten its belly and quickly lays flat! Use as both a toy and a pillow for TV, bed, or travel time.
CARE AND MAINTENANCE: Wash on gentle cycle and cold water placing your Pillow Pet inside a white pillow case and tying off the open ends to prevent damage during washing and maintain plush.
SPECIFICS: An official Pillow Pets product. Made of soft high-quality chenille. Opens to a 16-inch Pillow. Not recommended for children under the age of 3.
